messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Miyamoto Musashi website
messages.msgSnippet: There is a link to a good historical Musashi site through the Usagi Yojimbo website at http//www.usagiyojimbo.com The site has a descent amount of factual info
messages.messageBody:
There is a link to a good historical Musashi site through the Usagi Yojimbo
website at http//www.usagiyojimbo.com
The site has a descent amount of factual info on him, as well as
chronologies and lists of his fights i think..
I have'nt found others except work on Hyoho Niten Ichi Ryu (his sword
school) through various martial arts sites..Try www.koryu.com for the most
informative searches for Miyamoto Musashi.
Abayo.
Ben Sharples

messages.subject: Miyamoto Musashi website
messages.msgSnippet: A while back someone emailed me a link to a good history page on Miyamoto Musashi, which I lost almost immediately after taking a look - anyone have any links
messages.messageBody:
A while back someone emailed me a link to a good history page on
Miyamoto Musashi, which I lost almost immediately after taking a
look - anyone have any links to Musashi out there...?


c.
